                          IMessageListener.Type type,
                          java.lang.String subject,

Description copied from interface: IMessageListener
Handle message from remote user. This method will be called by some thread when a message is received.

Specified by:
handleMessage in interface IMessageListener
Parameters:
fromID - the ID of the user sending the message
toID - the ID of the user to receive the message
type - the Type of the message
subject - the subject of the message
messageBody - the message body

handleInvitationReceived

public void handleInvitationReceived(ID roomID,
                                     ID from,
                                     ID toID,
                                     java.lang.String subject,
                                     java.lang.String body)
Description copied from interface: IInvitationListener
Handle notification of a received invitation to join chat room. This method will be called by some thread when an invitiation is received by this user account to join a chat room

Specified by:
handleInvitationReceived in interface IInvitationListener
Parameters:
roomID - the room id associated with the invitation
from - the id of the sender
toID - the id of the intended receiver
subject - a subject for the invitation
body - a message body for the invitation
